column4: I think my question is how can i get ubuntu to boot back to normal with out reinstalling the OS and having to reinstall everything again
so what did you install since it was working?
java, gstream stuff, vlc, eclipse, netbeans, and thats it
is it ok if i pm you

o and i also installed dragon player, and a maryo game
